# recordPermission

**Instance Property**

The current recording permission status.

## Declaration

```swift
var recordPermission: AVAudioSession.RecordPermission { get }
```

## Return Value

Returns one of three status values:

## Discussion

- The user granted permission to record ([doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/RecordPermission-swift.enum/granted]).
- The user denied recording permission ([doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/RecordPermission-swift.enum/denied]).
- Recording permission hasn’t been requested ([doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/RecordPermission-swift.enum/undetermined]).

## Data Types

- **AVAudioSession.RecordPermission**: The values that define the current state of the record permission request.

## Requesting permission to record

- **requestRecordPermission(_:)**: Requests the user’s permission to record audio.
